changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.comment: AHS-13023: Migrate existing water trucks to the new water truck classes
changeSet.sql: UPDATE MACHINECLASS set ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.MachineClass.AuxiliaryClass.AuxMobileClass.WaterTruckClass' where CATEGORY = (SELECT MACHINECATEGORY_OID from MACHINECATEGORY where name = 'Water Truck Classes')

UPDATE MACHINE set ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.Machine.WaterTruck' where CLASS IN ( SELECT MACHINECLASS_OID from MACHINECLASS where MACHINECLASS.ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.MachineClass.AuxiliaryClass.AuxMobileClass.WaterTruckClass')

rollback.sql: UPDATE MACHINECLASS set ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.MachineClass.AuxiliaryClass.AuxMobileClass' where ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.MachineClass.AuxiliaryClass.AuxMobileClass.WaterTruckClass'
UPDATE MACHINE set ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.Machine.Auxiliary.AuxMobile' where ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.Machine.WaterTruck'
